entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 11:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Periods of rain along parts of the coast. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 20.
